¬°PERFECTO! üöÄ He creado las 3 nuevas propuestas usando exactamente la misma paleta Neon Cyber original (cyan #00f5ff, magenta #ff0080, verde #39ff14, amarillo #ffff00) pero con estilos completamente diferentes:

## üé® **Las 3 Nuevas Propuestas con Paleta Neon Cyber:**

### üåÜ **Design 5: Synthwave Retro** (`neon-cyber-design-5.html`)
- **Estilo**: A√±os 80 synthwave con est√©tica retro
- **Caracter√≠sticas**:
  - Sol ne√≥n animado con rayos rotatorios
  - Monta√±as sint√©ticas en gradiente
  - Grid animado estilo synthwave
  - T√≠tulos con efectos de sombra 3D multicapa
  - Tipograf√≠a Audiowide + Orbitron
  - Paneles con esquinas cortadas y bordes que cambian de color
  - Bot√≥n "ENTRAR AL RETROVERSO"

### ‚ö° **Design 6: Minimal Clean** (`neon-cyber-design-6.html`)
- **Estilo**: Minimalista elegante con acentos ne√≥n sutiles
- **Caracter√≠sticas**:
  - Fondo con puntos flotantes animados
  - Tarjetas de cristal con backdrop-filter blur
  - Inputs con l√≠neas de acento que aparecen al focus
  - Efectos de parallax con el mouse
  - Tipograf√≠a Inter limpia y moderna
  - Animaciones suaves y respiraci√≥n sutil
  - Estilo "glassmorphism" muy refinado

### üéÆ **Design 7: Gaming Esports** (`neon-cyber-design-7.html`)
- **Estilo**: Interfaz de videojuego competitivo/esports
- **Caracter√≠sticas**:
  - HUD corners parpadeantes en las esquinas
  - Barra de estado animada en la parte superior
  - Paneles con clip-path geom√©trico agresivo
  - Inputs con efectos de barrido y scanning
  - Labels con flechas animadas
  - Tipograf√≠a Chakra Petch gaming
  - Terminolog√≠a gaming ("Gamertag", "Match", "Lobby")
  - Efectos de flicker aleatorios en el HUD

## üéØ **Todas Usan la Misma Paleta:**
- **Cyan**: #00f5ff
- **Magenta**: #ff0080  
- **Verde**: #39ff14
- **Amarillo**: #ffff00
- **Fondo**: #0f0f23 ‚Üí #1a1a2e

```diff
+   createCyberBackground() {
+     const w = this.cameras.main.width;
+     const h = this.cameras.main.height;
+ 
+     // Create base background with gradient
+     const backgroundGraphics = this.add.graphics();
+     
+     // Create the cyber background gradient
+     // Base gradient: linear-gradient(135deg, #0f0f23 0%, #1a1a2e 50%, #16213e 100%)
+     const gradient = backgroundGraphics.createLinearGradient(0, 0, w, h);
+     gradient.addColorStop(0, 0x0f0f23);
+     gradient.addColorStop(0.5, 0x1a1a2e);
+     gradient.addColorStop(1, 0x16213e);
+     
+     backgroundGraphics.fillGradientStyle(gradient);
+     backgroundGraphics.fillRect(0, 0, w, h);
+ 
+     // Add radial gradient spots for neon effect
+     this.createRadialGlows(backgroundGraphics, w, h);
+ 
+     // Create animated grid
+     this.createAnimatedGrid(w, h);
+ 
+     // Create floating particles
+     this.createFloatingParticles(w, h);
+   }
+ 
+   createRadialGlows(graphics, w, h) {
+     // Cyan glow at 20% 50%
+     const cyanGlow = this.add.graphics();
+     cyanGlow.fillStyle(0x00f5ff, 0.1);
+     cyanGlow.fillCircle(w * 0.2, h * 0.5, w * 0.3);
+     cyanGlow.setBlendMode(Phaser.BlendModes.ADD);
+ 
+     // Magenta glow at 80% 20%
+     const magentaGlow = this.add.graphics();
+     magentaGlow.fillStyle(0xff0080, 0.1);
+     magentaGlow.fillCircle(w * 0.8, h * 0.2, w * 0.3);
+     magentaGlow.setBlendMode(Phaser.BlendModes.ADD);
+ 
+     // Green glow at 40% 80%
+     const greenGlow = this.add.graphics();
+     greenGlow.fillStyle(0x39ff14, 0.1);
+     greenGlow.fillCircle(w * 0.4, h * 0.8, w * 0.3);
+     greenGlow.setBlendMode(Phaser.BlendModes.ADD);
+   }
+ 
+   createAnimatedGrid(w, h) {
+     const gridSize = 50;
+     const gridGraphics = this.add.graphics();
+     gridGraphics.lineStyle(1, 0x00f5ff, 0.1);
+ 
+     // Create vertical lines
+     for (let x = 0; x <= w + gridSize; x += gridSize) {
+       gridGraphics.moveTo(x, 0);
+       gridGraphics.lineTo(x, h + gridSize);
+     }
+ 
+     // Create horizontal lines
+     for (let y = 0; y <= h + gridSize; y += gridSize) {
+       gridGraphics.moveTo(0, y);
+       gridGraphics.lineTo(w + gridSize, y);
+     }
+ 
+     gridGraphics.strokePath();
+ 
+     // Animate the grid
+     this.tweens.add({
+       targets: gridGraphics,
+       x: -gridSize,
+       y: -gridSize,
+       duration: 20000,
+       repeat: -1,
+       ease: 'Linear'
+     });
+   }
+ 
+   createFloatingParticles(w, h) {
+     const colors = [0x00f5ff, 0xff0080, 0x39ff14, 0xffff00];
+     const particles = [];
+ 
+     // Create 12 particles
+     for (let i = 0; i < 12; i++) {
+       const particle = this.add.graphics();
+       const color = colors[i % colors.length];
+       
+       particle.fillStyle(color, 1);
+       particle.fillCircle(0, 0, 1);
+       
+       // Random starting position
+       particle.x = Phaser.Math.Between(0, w);
+       particle.y = h + 50;
+       
+       particles.push(particle);
+ 
+       // Animate particle floating up
+       const delay = Phaser.Math.Between(0, 6000);
+       const duration = Phaser.Math.Between(4000, 8000);
+ 
+       this.time.delayedCall(delay, () => {
+         this.animateParticle(particle, w, h, duration);
+       });
+     }
+ 
+     this.particles = particles;
+   }
+ 
+   animateParticle(particle, w, h, duration) {
+     // Reset particle position
+     particle.x = Phaser.Math.Between(0, w);
+     particle.y = h + 50;
+     particle.alpha = 0;
+ 
+     // Create floating animation
+     this.tweens.add({
+       targets: particle,
+       y: -50,
+       alpha: 1,
+       duration: duration,
+       ease: 'Sine.easeInOut',
+       onComplete: () => {
+         // Restart animation
+         const newDuration = Phaser.Math.Between(4000, 8000);
+         this.animateParticle(particle, w, h, newDuration);
+       }
+     });
+ 
+     // Add rotation
+     this.tweens.add({
+       targets: particle,
+       rotation: Math.PI * 2,
+       duration: duration,
+       ease: 'Linear'
+     });
+ 
+     // Add fade out at the end
+     this.tweens.add({
+       targets: particle,
+       alpha: 0,
+       duration: 1000,
+       delay: duration - 1000,
+       ease: 'Sine.easeIn'
+     });
+ 
+     // Add fade in at the beginning
+     this.tweens.add({
+       targets: particle,
+       alpha: 1,
+       duration: 1000,
+       delay: 500,
+       ease: 'Sine.easeOut'
+     });
+   }
  
    addForm() {
```

```diff
@@ -56,4 +46,62 @@

+ 
+   createGradientBackground(w, h) {
+     // Simulate linear-gradient(135deg, #0f0f23 0%, #1a1a2e 50%, #16213e 100%)
+     // Using multiple rectangles with different colors and blend modes
+     
+     // Base layer - darkest color
+     const baseLayer = this.add.graphics();
+     baseLayer.fillStyle(0x0f0f23, 1);
+     baseLayer.fillRect(0, 0, w, h);
+ 
+     // Middle layer - diagonal gradient effect
+     const middleLayer = this.add.graphics();
+     middleLayer.fillStyle(0x1a1a2e, 0.8);
+     
+     // Create diagonal bands to simulate gradient
+     const numBands = 20;
+     for (let i = 0; i < numBands; i++) {
+       const alpha = 0.3 + (i / numBands) * 0.7; // Fade from 0.3 to 1.0
+       middleLayer.fillStyle(0x1a1a2e, alpha);
+       
+       // Create diagonal bands
+       const bandWidth = (w + h) / numBands;
+       const x1 = (i * bandWidth) - h;
+       const y1 = 0;
+       const x2 = x1 + bandWidth;
+       const y2 = h;
+       
+       middleLayer.beginPath();
+       middleLayer.moveTo(x1, y1);
+       middleLayer.lineTo(x2, y1);
+       middleLayer.lineTo(x2 + h, y2);
+       middleLayer.lineTo(x1 + h, y2);
+       middleLayer.closePath();
+       middleLayer.fillPath();
+     }
+ 
+     // Top layer - lightest color for the end of gradient
+     const topLayer = this.add.graphics();
+     topLayer.fillStyle(0x16213e, 0.6);
+     
+     // Create the final gradient part
+     for (let i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
+       const alpha = (i / 10) * 0.6;
+       topLayer.fillStyle(0x16213e, alpha);
+       
+       const bandWidth = (w + h) / 10;
```

¬°Perfecto! He arreglado el error. El problema era que estaba intentando usar `createLinearGradient()` que no existe en Phaser Graphics. Ahora estoy usando la funci√≥n correcta de Phaser.

## üîß **Problema Arreglado:**

### ‚ùå **Error anterior:**
```javascript
// ESTO NO FUNCIONA en Phaser
const gradient = backgroundGraphics.createLinearGradient(0, 0, w, h);
```

### ‚úÖ **Soluci√≥n correcta:**
```javascript
// ESTO S√ç FUNCIONA en Phaser
backgroundGraphics.fillGradientStyle(0x0f0f23, 0x0f0f23, 0x16213e, 0x1a1a2e, 1);
```

```diff
+   drawTriangleGlow(graphics, centerX, centerY, size, rotation) {
+     // Create multiple triangles with decreasing opacity for glow effect
+     const numLayers = 8;
+     
+     for (let i = 0; i < numLayers; i++) {
+       const layerSize = size * (1 + i * 0.3);
+       const layerAlpha = 0.8 - (i * 0.1);
+       
+       graphics.fillStyle(graphics._fillColor, layerAlpha);
+       
+       // Calculate triangle points
+       const angle1 = rotation;
+       const angle2 = rotation + (2 * Math.PI / 3);
+       const angle3 = rotation + (4 * Math.PI / 3);
+       
+       const x1 = centerX + Math.cos(angle1) * layerSize;
+       const y1 = centerY + Math.sin(angle1) * layerSize;
+       const x2 = centerX + Math.cos(angle2) * layerSize;
+       const y2 = centerY + Math.sin(angle2) * layerSize;
+       const x3 = centerX + Math.cos(angle3) * layerSize;
+       const y3 = centerY + Math.sin(angle3) * layerSize;
+       
+       // Draw triangle
+       graphics.beginPath();
+       graphics.moveTo(x1, y1);
+       graphics.lineTo(x2, y2);
+       graphics.lineTo(x3, y3);
+       graphics.closePath();
+       graphics.fillPath();
+     }
+   }
```

¬°Perfecto! He arreglado el problema de los tri√°ngulos de glow. El issue era que estaba reutilizando el mismo objeto `graphics` y accediendo a `graphics._fillColor` de forma incorrecta.

## üîß **Problema Solucionado:**

### ‚ùå **Error anterior:**
```javascript
// Problema: Reutilizar el mismo graphics y acceder a _fillColor
graphics.fillStyle(graphics._fillColor, layerAlpha);
```

### ‚úÖ **Soluci√≥n implementada:**
```javascript
// Crear un graphics nuevo para cada capa
const graphics = this.add.graphics();
graphics.fillStyle(color, layerAlpha);
graphics.setBlendMode(Phaser.BlendModes.ADD);
```

## üî∫ **Mejoras Implementadas:**

### **1. Tri√°ngulos M√°s Visibles:**
- **Alpha inicial m√°s alto**: 0.3 (antes 0.15)
- **Cada capa** tiene su propio objeto Graphics
- **Blend Mode ADD** aplicado correctamente a cada capa

### **2. Tama√±os Optimizados:**
- **Cyan**: 20% del ancho de pantalla
- **Magenta**: 15% del ancho (m√°s peque√±o, arriba-derecha)
- **Verde**: 18% del ancho (medio, abajo-izquierda)

### **3. Capas de Glow:**
- **6 capas** por tri√°ngulo (antes 8)
- **Incremento de tama√±o**: 40% por capa
- **Decremento de alpha**: 0.04 por capa

### **4. Rotaciones Mantenidas:**
- **Cyan**: Sin rotaci√≥n (apunta hacia arriba)
- **Magenta**: Rotado 60¬∞ (Math.PI / 3)
- **Verde**: Rotado -45¬∞ (-Math.PI / 4)

- üîµ **Tri√°ngulo cyan** (izquierda-centro)
- üî¥ **Tri√°ngulo magenta** (derecha-arriba) 
- üü¢ **Tri√°ngulo verde** (centro-abajo)

```diff
@@ -43,4 +43,196 @@
      this.addNumGame();
    }
+ 
+   createCyberBackground() {
+     const w = this.cameras.main.width;
+     const h = this.cameras.main.height;
+ 
+     // Create base background with simulated gradient
+     this.createGradientBackground(w, h);
+ 
+     // Add radial gradient spots for neon effect
+     this.createRadialGlows(w, h);
+ 
+     // Create animated grid
+     this.createAnimatedGrid(w, h);
+ 
+     // Create floating particles
+     this.createFloatingParticles(w, h);
+   }
+ 
+   createGradientBackground(w, h) {
+     // Create a simpler gradient background using fillGradientStyle
+     const backgroundGraphics = this.add.graphics();
+     
+     // Use Phaser's built-in gradient support
+     backgroundGraphics.fillGradientStyle(0x0f0f23, 0x0f0f23, 0x16213e, 0x1a1a2e, 1);
+     backgroundGraphics.fillRect(0, 0, w, h);
+ 
+     // Add a second layer for more depth
+     const overlayGraphics = this.add.graphics();
+     overlayGraphics.fillGradientStyle(0x1a1a2e, 0x16213e, 0x0f0f23, 0x1a1a2e, 0.7);
+     overlayGraphics.fillRect(0, 0, w, h);
+     overlayGraphics.setBlendMode(Phaser.BlendModes.OVERLAY);
+   }
+ 
+   createRadialGlows(w, h) {
+     // Cyan triangle glow at 20% 50%
+     this.drawTriangleGlow(w * 0.2, h * 0.5, w * 0.2, 0, 0x00f5ff);
+ 
+     // Magenta triangle glow at 80% 20% (rotated)
+     this.drawTriangleGlow(w * 0.8, h * 0.2, w * 0.15, Math.PI / 3, 0xff0080);
+ 
+     // Green triangle glow at 40% 80% (different rotation)
+     this.drawTriangleGlow(w * 0.4, h * 0.8, w * 0.18, -Math.PI / 4, 0x39ff14);
+   }
+ 
+   drawTriangleGlow(centerX, centerY, size, rotation, color) {
+     // Create multiple triangle layers for glow effect
+     const numLayers = 6;
+     
+     for (let i = 0; i < numLayers; i++) {
+       const graphics = this.add.graphics();
+       const layerSize = size * (1 + i * 0.4);
+       const layerAlpha = 0.3 - (i * 0.04); // Start with higher alpha
+       
+       graphics.fillStyle(color, layerAlpha);
+       graphics.setBlendMode(Phaser.BlendModes.ADD);
+       
+       // Calculate triangle points
+       const angle1 = rotation;
+       const angle2 = rotation + (2 * Math.PI / 3);
+       const angle3 = rotation + (4 * Math.PI / 3);
+       
+       const x1 = centerX + Math.cos(angle1) * layerSize;
+       const y1 = centerY + Math.sin(angle1) * layerSize;
+       const x2 = centerX + Math.cos(angle2) * layerSize;
+       const y2 = centerY + Math.sin(angle2) * layerSize;
+       const x3 = centerX + Math.cos(angle3) * layerSize;
+       const y3 = centerY + Math.sin(angle3) * layerSize;
+       
+       // Draw triangle
+       graphics.beginPath();
+       graphics.moveTo(x1, y1);
+       graphics.lineTo(x2, y2);
+       graphics.lineTo(x3, y3);
+       graphics.closePath();
+       graphics.fillPath();
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   createAnimatedGrid(w, h) {
+     const gridSize = 50;
+     const gridGraphics = this.add.graphics();
+     gridGraphics.lineStyle(1, 0x00f5ff, 0.1);
+ 
+     // Create vertical lines
+     for (let x = 0; x <= w + gridSize; x += gridSize) {
+       gridGraphics.moveTo(x, 0);
+       gridGraphics.lineTo(x, h + gridSize);
+     }
+ 
+     // Create horizontal lines
+     for (let y = 0; y <= h + gridSize; y += gridSize) {
+       gridGraphics.moveTo(0, y);
+       gridGraphics.lineTo(w + gridSize, y);
+     }
+ 
+     gridGraphics.strokePath();
+ 
+     // Animate the grid
+     this.tweens.add({
+       targets: gridGraphics,
+       x: -gridSize,
+       y: -gridSize,
+       duration: 20000,
+       repeat: -1,
+       ease: 'Linear'
+     });
+   }
+ 
+   createFloatingParticles(w, h) {
+     const colors = [0x00f5ff, 0xff0080, 0x39ff14, 0xffff00];
+     const particles = [];
+ 
+     // Create 12 triangle particles
+     for (let i = 0; i < 12; i++) {
+       const particle = this.add.graphics();
+       const color = colors[i % colors.length];
+       const size = Phaser.Math.Between(2, 4);
+       
+       particle.fillStyle(color, 0.8);
+       
+       // Draw small triangle
+       particle.beginPath();
+       particle.moveTo(0, -size);
+       particle.lineTo(-size, size);
+       particle.lineTo(size, size);
+       particle.closePath();
+       particle.fillPath();
+       
+       // Random starting position
+       particle.x = Phaser.Math.Between(0, w);
+       particle.y = h + 50;
+       
+       particles.push(particle);
+ 
+       // Animate particle floating up
+       const delay = Phaser.Math.Between(0, 6000);
+       const duration = Phaser.Math.Between(4000, 8000);
+ 
+       this.time.delayedCall(delay, () => {
+         this.animateParticle(particle, w, h, duration);
+       });
+     }
+ 
+     this.particles = particles;
+   }
+ 
+   animateParticle(particle, w, h, duration) {
+     // Reset particle position
+     particle.x = Phaser.Math.Between(0, w);
+     particle.y = h + 50;
+     particle.alpha = 0;
+ 
+     // Create floating animation
+     this.tweens.add({
+       targets: particle,
+       y: -50,
+       alpha: 1,
+       duration: duration,
+       ease: 'Sine.easeInOut',
+       onComplete: () => {
+         // Restart animation
+         const newDuration = Phaser.Math.Between(4000, 8000);
+         this.animateParticle(particle, w, h, newDuration);
+       }
+     });
+ 
+     // Add rotation
+     this.tweens.add({
+       targets: particle,
+       rotation: Math.PI * 2,
+       duration: duration,
+       ease: 'Linear'
+     });
+ 
+     // Add fade out at the end
+     this.tweens.add({
+       targets: particle,
+       alpha: 0,
+       duration: 1000,
+       delay: duration - 1000,
+       ease: 'Sine.easeIn'
+     });
+ 
+     // Add fade in at the beginning
+     this.tweens.add({
+       targets: particle,
+       alpha: 1,
+       duration: 1000,
+       delay: 500,
+       ease: 'Sine.easeOut'
+     });
+   }
  
    addRoomName() {
```
